casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Aaron PITTMAN. No. 175P12-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. Oct. 1, 2015. Bruce T. Cunningham, Jr., Raleigh, for Pittman, Aaron. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Kathleen N. Bolton, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Samuel B. Currin, III, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

Opinion

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 29th of September 2015 by State of NC for Extension of Time to Respond to Petition for Writ of Certiorari:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 1st of October 2015."
ERVIN, J. recused.
